title: Blood log
description: Each entry records results from a Complete Blood Count or similar blood measurements.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when blood was extracted

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time when blood was extracted

location_id.description: location where the blood was extracted

person_id.description: the person providing the blood sample

exam_results_url.description: url to scanned copy of the results

uric_mg_dL.description: measure of uric acid in blood in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

helicobacter_pylori_iga_index.description: Measures IgA antibodies which develop in the body in response to infection with the bacteria Helicobacter Pylori (H. Pylori)

helicobacter_pylori_igg_AU_mL.description: Measures IgA antibodies which develop in the body in response to infection with the bacteria Helicobacter Pylori (H. Pylori) in arbitrary units (AU) per milliliter (mL)

toxoplasma_igg_U_mL.description: Toxoplasma IgG antibody in units (U) per milliliter (mL)

toxoplasma_igm_U_mL.description: Toxoplasma IgM antibody in units (U) per milliliter (mL)

transglutaminase_iga_U_ml.description: A transglutaminase IgA (tTg-IgA) test is used to help doctors diagnose celiac disease in units (U) per milliliter (mL)

psa_ng_mL.description: prostate specific antigen measured in nanograms (ng) per milliliter (mL)

psa_free_ng_mL.description: Free prostate-specific antigen measured in nanograms (ng) per milliliter (mL)

white_k_uL.description: white blood cell count - thousand (k) per microliter (uL)

red_M_uL.description: red blood cell count - million (M) per microliter (uL)

hematocrit_%.description: Hematocrit - percentage of white cell volume to red cell volume

mcv_fL.description: mean corpuscular volume - average volume of a red blood cell in femtoliters (fL)

mch_pg.description: mean corpuscular hemoglobin - the average amount of hemoglobin in the average red cell in picograms (pg)

mchc_g_dL.description: mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration - the average concentration of hemoglobin in a given volume of red cells in grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

mpv_fL.description: mean platelet volume - measures the average amount (volume) of platelets in femtoliters (fL)

rdw_%.description: Red cell distribution width (coefficient of variation) - measures the variability of a red cell size and shape as percentage

platelet_k_uL.description: platelet count - measured as thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

neutrophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

neutrophils_cells_k_uL.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

eosinophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

eosinophils_cells_k_uL.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

basophils_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

basophils_cells_k_uL.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

lymphocytes_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

lymphocytes_cells_k_uL.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

monocytes_%.description: one of five types of white blood cells in percentage

monocytes_cells_k_uL.description: one of five types of white blood cells measured in thousands (k) per microliter (uL)

erythroblasts_NRBC_%.description: Nucleated red blood cells (NRBCs) are immature red blood cells produced in the bone marrow. In adults, their presence in the blood indicates a problem with bone marrow integrity or red blood cell production.

erythroblasts_NRBC_k_uL.description: Nucleated red blood cells (NRBCs) are immature red blood cells produced in the bone marrow. In adults, their presence in the blood indicates a problem with bone marrow integrity or red blood cell production.

glucose_mg_dL.description: glucose in blood measured in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

glycosylated hemoglobin_%.descrption: measures the amount of glucose (sugar) in your blood. The test is often called A1c, or sometimes HbA1c. It's a simple blood test used to: Detect prediabetes — high sugar levels that can lead to diabetes, heart disease and stroke.

alt_U_L.description: Alanine Aminotransferase for checking liver damange in units (u) per liter (L)

alp_U_L.description: alkaline phosphatase measured in units (u) per liter (L)

amylase_U_L.description: An amylase blood test measures the amount of amylase in blood.

ast_U_L.description: Aspartate Aminotransferase for checking liver damage in units (u) per liter (L)

ggt_U_L.description: Gamma-glutamyl Transferase for checking liber damage. In units (u) per liter (L)

ldh_uL_L.description: ldh lactic dehydrogenase in microliter (uL) per liter (L)

cholesterol_total_mg_dL.description: cholesterol in blood milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

cholesterol_hdl_mg_dL.description: hdl cholesterol in blood milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

cholesterol_ldl_mg_dL.description: ldl cholesterol in blood milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

triglycerides_mg_dL.description: measure of triglycerides in blood in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

beta_hcg_mu_mL.description: hormone human chorionic gonadotropin measured in million units (mu) per milliliter (mL)

t4_free_ng_dL.description: Measures the level of free T 4, or free thyroxine, in blood in nanograms (ng) per deciliter (dL) .

azotemia_mg_%.description: Azotemia is an elevation of blood urea nitrogen (BUN) and serum creatinine levels.

eGFR_mL_min.description: estimated glomerular filtration rate in milliliters (mL) per minute (min).

esr_mm_hr.description: Erythro Sedimentation rate measured in millimeters (mm) per hour (hr)

hemolysis_index_mg_dL.description: The hemolysis index is a measurement of the red colour of serum in milligrams (mg) per deciLiter (dL)

icterus_index_mg_dL.description: The icterus index is a measure of the yellow colour of serum in milligrams (mg) per deciLiter (dL).

lipemic index.description: A measurement of the abnormally high concentration of lipid in serum.

calcium_mEq_L.description: calcium in in milliequivalents (mEq) per liter (L)

chloride_mEq_L.descrption: The chloride blood test, or serum chloride level in milliequivalents (mEq) per liter (L).

magnesium_mEq_L.description: Measure of magnesium in the blood in milliequivalents (mEq) per liter (L).

sideremia_ug_dL.description: transports iron in the blood; measured in micrograms (ug) per deciliter (dL)

bilirubin_total_mg_dL.description: Bilirubin total in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

bilirubin_direct_mg_dL.description: Bilirubin direct in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

bilirubin_indirect_mg_dL.description: Bilirubin indirect in milligrams (mg) per deciliter (dL)

crp_mg_L.description: c-reactive protein measured in milligrams (mg) per liter (L)

proteine_total_g_%.descrption: Measures the amount of protein in the blood.

ferritin_ug_L.description: ferritin measured as micrograms (ug) per liter (L)

transferrin_mg_dL.description: Transferrin is the main protein in the blood that binds to iron and transports it throughout the body in milligrams (mg) per deciLiter(dL).

transferrin_saturation_%.description: It is the value of serum iron divided by the total iron-binding capacity of the available transferrin.

alpha1_%.description: measures alpha1 globulins in the blood

alpha2_%.description: measures alpha2 globulins in the blood

beta1_%.description: measures beta1 globulins in the blood

beta2_%.description: measures beta2 globulins in the blood

gamma_%.description: measures gamm globulins in the blood

alpha1_g_dL.description: measures alpha1 globulins in the blood grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

alpha2_g_dL.description: measures alpha2 globulins in the blood grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

beta1_g_dL.description: measures beta1 globulins in the blood grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

beta2_g_dL.description: measures beta2 globulins in the blood grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

gamma_g_dL.description: measures gamma globulins in the blood grams (g) per deciliter (dL)

vitamin_d3_ng_mL.description: A measure of how much vitamin D is in the body in nanograms (ng) per milliliter (mL).
